content.rendered:
Media library & contacts

Assets intended for use by media professionals.

These images are downloadable for non-commercial use and for purposes such as news reporting or research. The images may not be modified and must display the following copyright language: Copyright © 2022 Merck & Co., Inc., Rahway, NJ, USA and its affiliates. All rights reserved.

Learn more about Merck’s copyright and trademark policies.
